sentences.en: Economic globalization and regionalization are two important trends in the present development of world economy.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化和区域经济一体化是当今世界经济发展的两大重要趋势.

sentences.en: Nowadays the tendency of regionalization and conglomeration in world economy have continuously strengthened.
sentences.cn: 当前,世界经济区域化、集团化的趋势在继续加强.

sentences.en: Resembling with local tectonic belts , the patterns tectonic traps has regionalization.
sentences.cn: 阿克库勒凸起构造圈闭类型受局部构造带控制,平面上具有分区性.

sentences.en: The paper mainly introduced the application of GIS technique in regionalization of regional potential land use.
sentences.cn: 重点讨论了GIS技术在区域土地开发适宜性分区方法中的应用.

sentences.en: The regionalization of TV program is premise for regionalization of TV media.
sentences.cn: 电视节目区域化是电视媒介区域化的前提.

sentences.en: Today, globalization and regionalization are running parallel in the world.
sentences.cn: 当今世界, 全球化与区域化并行发展.

sentences.en: Urban regionalization is the high stage of urbanization.
sentences.cn: 城市区域化是城市化的高级阶段.
